edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.interfaces

Interface ActiveGNSInterface


  • public interface ActiveGNSInterface
    Author:
    arun This interface is meant to be used by JS to issue read/write operations, so an active request worker is expected to pass an instance of this interface to JS via the script engine. This interface currently only supports simple field read and write queries. It currently does not support create, delete, select, or CommandType.Type.OTHER commands or for that matter other CommandType.Type.READ or CommandType.Type.UPDATE queries, but some subset of these other query types may be supported in future versions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JSONObject read(String targetGUID, ArrayList<String> fields) 
      JSONObject read(String targetGUID, String field)
      This method will return the value of targetGUID.field and is meant to be used by JS running in the script engine.
      void write(String targetGUID, String field, JSONObject valuesMap) 

    • Method Detail

      • read

        JSONObject read(String targetGUID,
                String field)
         throws ClientException
        This method will return the value of targetGUID.field and is meant to be used by JS running in the script engine. This method can be used to read the entire GUID record (subject to ACL checks) by specifying field as GNSCommandProtocol.ALL_FIELDS.
        Parameters:
        targetGUID -
        field -
        Returns:
        JSONObject representation of guid.field.
        Throws:
        ClientException

      • read

        JSONObject read(String targetGUID,
                ArrayList<String> fields)
        Parameters:
        targetGUID -
        fields -
        Returns:
        JSONObject representation of values of fields of targetGUID.

      • write

        void write(String targetGUID,
           String field,
           JSONObject valuesMap)
    throws ClientException
        Parameters:
        targetGUID -
        field - The queried (updated) field.
        valuesMap - The value being assigned to field.
        Throws:
        ClientException
